resource.description: A resouce representing association of a bank account to a customer account . Required for delivery of currency.

attribute.name: name
attribute.comment: A short nickname for this bank account

attribute.name: beneficiary
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. The name of the account to be used for interbank instruction

attribute.name: beneficiary-address
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. Address of account holder. Some destination payment systems require this for some account types

attribute.name: iban
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. A valid IBAN

attribute.name: bic
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. A valid swift institution identifier

attribute.name: account-number
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. A valid account number for the destination country's payment system.

attribute.name: national-clearing-code
attribute.comment: Used in POST requests for resource creation only. A valid clearing code for the destination country's payment system. UK sort code, US ABA routing number, etc.

url.comment: Returns collection of all beneficiaries for a customer account.
